I'm assigning this to VE because this is more likely to be a problem with one of the VE models than an actual problem in EMF itself.  In any case, I need a reproducible EMF test case to look at a problem like this.

Most of these were caused by beaninfo cache going bad due to some timing problems.

The workaround until you get the fix is to clear the cache and try again:

1) Open a VE, close it immediately.
2) Close all open VE's.
3) Do Project->Clean...->Clean all. Wait for build to complete.
4) Open the VE. It should now be ok until next time cache goes bad. Which hopefully will be awhile before that happens.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 123655 ***
